attributes.action: Sort out the huge problem of litter been dropped everywhere.
attributes.additional_details: Because the litter been dropped is getting worse and nothing seems to be getting done about it.
attributes.background: Go on a mass litter campaign to KEEP BRITAIN TIDY.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Fund a national anti-littering campaign.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566467

Provide additional funding for collection of roadside rubbish in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561073
